File.submissionSuccess: Your file and information have been successfully received. Our team will contact you as soon as possible.
File.uploadPrompt: Get an instant quote with STP | DXF | JPEG | JPG | PNG | PDF files
File.secureUploads: All uploads are secure and confidential.

step1.title: Get Instant Quote
step1.description: To get an instant quote: After uploading your 3D model, simply select the manufacturing technology and material.

step2.title: Place Order
step2.description: After placing your order, the manufacturing process begins. You will receive regular updates.

step3.title: Receive Parts
step3.description: We provide quality assurance, inspection reports, and delivery tracking.

Advantages.sectionTitle: Advantages of Xometry Laser Cutting Service

highSpeed.title: High-Speed Manufacturing
highSpeed.description: Using state-of-the-art laser cutting machines, Xometry enables you to produce finished parts with instant sheet metal pricing and lead times starting from 7 business days.

highPrecision.title: High Precision
highPrecision.description: Xometry offers a range of tolerance options according to ISO 2768 (standard, fine).

advancedSurface.title: Advanced Surface Options
advancedSurface.description: Manufacture with advanced surface options like anodizing, powder coating, and painting.

materialSelection.title: Material Selection
materialSelection.description: Choose from metal materials with high strength, corrosion resistance, and various conductivity and weight properties.

qualityControl.title: Quality Control
qualityControl.description: Our Quality Control department provides strong quality assurance. Xometry is ISO 9001 certified.

certificatesReports.title: Certificates and Measurement Reports
certificatesReports.description: Xometry can provide certificates (e.g., material certificates) and quality control reports (CMM, FAIR, etc.) tailored to your custom parts.

OrderSuccessFeedback.successMessage: Your order has been successfully received. It will be processed as soon as possible. Thank you!

materials.1050_description: High softness and machinability make it ideal for decoration, kitchen utensils, and sheet coverings.
materials.5754_description: Exceptional corrosion resistance and strength, ideal for marine, automotive, and chemical storage.
materials.GalvanizliSac_description: Coated to resist rust, providing durability and longevity.
materials.SiyahSac_description: Raw steel type used in structural and industrial applications.
materials.DC01_description: Low-carbon steel suitable for deep drawing, with a smooth and bright surface for painting or coating.
materials.ST37_description: Structural steel known for its weldability and cost-effectiveness.
materials.Paslanmaz304_description: Highly corrosion-resistant, ideal for kitchen equipment and medical tools.
materials.Paslanmaz316L_description: Marine-grade stainless steel with exceptional chemical resistance.
